title: Looking for Old Mill Southern Leaguers
author: Moose117

posts.post_title: Looking for Old Mill Southern Leaguers
posts.post_content:
Looking for the following, only with an Old Mill back.
Strong preference for graded, but will consider raw.
Looking in the low grade range, say Poor to Good.

New month, same search.
Let's put some extra Christmas cash in your pockets!

Crossed two more off today, still searching...
Open to trading cash and/or cards, depending on what you've got!

Happy New Year!
26 down, 22 to go.
Help me start the year off right by crossing off a couple more of these...
